channel.title: Run Whonix Workstation on a PowerPC Machine [Physical Isolation Setup]
channel.description: From my [other question](https://forums.whonix.org/t/using-wlan0-to-connect-to-internet-on-physical-isolating-gateway/3588?u=adaying89): [quote="Adaying89, post:1, topic:3588"] If it possible to get Whonix Workstation running on a powerpc? If not, I have a secondary device that uses x64 but would still prefer to use the powerpc. [/quote]

item.title: Run Whonix Workstation on a PowerPC Machine [Physical Isolation Setup]
item.dc:creator: Adaying89
item.description:
Hmm, I don’t know if this powerpc will support virtualization due to hardware limitations. Oh well…

Thanks for the info.

Read full topic
item.source: Run Whonix Workstation on a PowerPC Machine [Physical Isolation Setup]

item.title: Run Whonix Workstation on a PowerPC Machine [Physical Isolation Setup]
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
With or without vitualization?

With: If you can run VirtualBox? Then it should work, no?

Without: Might work. There are no PowerPC builds of Tor Browser.

Read full topic
item.source: Run Whonix Workstation on a PowerPC Machine [Physical Isolation Setup]

item.title: Run Whonix Workstation on a PowerPC Machine [Physical Isolation Setup]
item.dc:creator: Adaying89
item.description:
From my other question:

Using wlan0 to Connect to Internet on Physical Isolating Gateway

If it possible to get Whonix Workstation running on a powerpc? If not, I have a secondary device that uses x64 but would still prefer to use the powerpc.

Read full topic
item.source: Run Whonix Workstation on a PowerPC Machine [Physical Isolation Setup]
